spawn.spawnpole.bound: Your life is now bound to the spawn pole
spawn.spawnpole.destroyed: The spawn pole has been destroyed
spawn.spawnpole.restored: The spawn pole has been restored
spawn.spawnpole.unload: The spawnpole is not loaded anymore
commands.setspawnpole.fail.overworld: You cannot set a spawnpole outside the overworld
commands.setspawnpole.fail.beacon: A spawnpole requires a beacon to be placed
